alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 23 at 4:37AM MDT until October 23 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin
